thread.title: BRIEF-Joseph Payne Says Calling On Arcturus Therapeutics' Board To Hold EGM "Without Further Delay"

title: BRIEF-Joseph Payne Says Calling On Arcturus Therapeutics' Board To Hold EGM "Without Further Delay"

organizations.name: brief-joseph payne says calling on arcturus therapeutics' board to hold egm

text:
April 13, 2018 / 3:52 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Joseph Payne Says Calling On Arcturus Therapeutics' Board To Hold EGM "Without Further Delay" Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Joseph Payne: 
* JOSEPH PAYNE SAYS CALLING ON ARCTURUS THERAPEUTICS’ BOARD TO HOLD ITS EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING “WITHOUT FURTHER DELAY” 
* JOSEPH PAYNE SAYS CONSIDERING “ALL LEGAL OPTIONS” TO ENSURE ARCTURUS THERAPEUTICS’ EGM IS HELD AS SOON AS POSSIBLE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
